root.name: Ping Pals
root.description: OverviewPing Pals is a chat function developed by WayForward Technologies and published by THQ for the Nintendo DS. It was released on December 8th, 2004 in North America, March 11th, 2005 in Europe and February 24th, 2005 in Australia. The game allows for up to 16 players to connect wirelessly with one game card. The game has been criticized for being a glorified version of Pictochat, a chat program that comes built in on every DS.
